评论详情: I originally bought these glasses hoping I could use the shades part on my script glasses, but upon receipt of them I found that the shades were not removable. However, my son fell in love with them and they really looked great on him. Long story short, I gifted the glasses to my son. About the glasses, they were reasonably priced, appear to be durable, good quality, and great fit. Comes with your standard soft cloth case. All in all a great buy! 👍🏻
